Uses of Interface
opendial.bn.distribs.IndependentDistribution

  • Packages that use IndependentDistribution 
    Package Description
    opendial  
    opendial.bn.distribs  
    opendial.domains.rules.distribs

    • Uses of IndependentDistribution in opendial

      Methods in opendial that return IndependentDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IndependentDistribution DialogueSystem.getContent(java.lang.String variable)
      Returns the probability distribution associated with the variables in the current dialogue state.
      IndependentDistribution DialogueState.queryProb(java.lang.String variable)
      Returns the probability distribution corresponding to the values of the state variable provided as argument.
      IndependentDistribution DialogueState.queryProb(java.lang.String variable, boolean includeEvidence)
      Returns the probability distribution corresponding to the values of the state variable provided as argument.
      Methods in opendial with parameters of type IndependentDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> DialogueSystem.addContent(IndependentDistribution distrib)
      Adds the content (expressed as a categorical table over variables) to the current dialogue state, and subsequently updates the dialogue state.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> DialogueSystem.addIncrementalContent(IndependentDistribution content, boolean followPrevious)
      Adds the incremental content (expressed as a distribution over variables) to the current dialogue state, and subsequently updates it.
      void DialogueState.addToState(IndependentDistribution distrib)
      Adds the content provided as argument to the dialogue state.

    • Uses of IndependentDistribution in opendial.bn.distribs

      Classes in opendial.bn.distribs that implement IndependentDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CategoricalTable
      Representation of a categorical probability table P(X), where X is a random variable.
      class  ContinuousDistribution
      Representation of a continuous probability distribution, defined by an arbitrary density function over a single (univariate or multivariate) variable.
      class  SingleValueDistribution
      Representation of a distribution with a single value associated with a probability of 1.0.
      Methods in opendial.bn.distribs that return IndependentDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IndependentDistribution CategoricalTable.Builder.build()
      Builds the categorical table based on the provided rows.
      IndependentDistribution CategoricalTable.concatenate(CategoricalTable other)
      Concatenate the values for the two tables (assuming the two tables share the same variable).
      IndependentDistribution IndependentDistribution.copy()
      Returns a copy of the distribution.
      IndependentDistribution SingleValueDistribution.copy()
      Copies the distribution
      IndependentDistribution EmpiricalDistribution.createDiscrete(java.lang.String headVar)
      Creates a categorical table with the defined head variable given the samples
      IndependentDistribution EmpiricalDistribution.getMarginal(java.lang.String var)
      Returns an independent probability distribution on a single random variable based on the samples.
      IndependentDistribution MultivariateDistribution.getMarginal(java.lang.String variable)
      Returns the marginal probability distribution P(Xi) for a random variable Xi in X1,...Xn.
      IndependentDistribution MultivariateTable.getMarginal(java.lang.String variable)
      Returns the marginal distribution P(Xi) for a random variable Xi in X1,...Xn.
      default IndependentDistribution IndependentDistribution.getPosterior(Assignment condition)
      Returns itself.
      IndependentDistribution ConditionalTable.getProbDistrib(Assignment condition)
      Returns the (unconditional) probability distribution P(X) given the conditional assignment.
      default IndependentDistribution IndependentDistribution.getProbDistrib(Assignment condition)
      Returns itself.
      IndependentDistribution MarginalDistribution.getProbDistrib(Assignment condition)
      Returns the categorical table P(X) given the conditional assignment for the variables Y1,...Yn.
      IndependentDistribution ProbDistribution.getProbDistrib(Assignment condition)
      Returns the (unconditional) probability distribution associated with the conditional assignment provided as argument.
      Methods in opendial.bn.distribs with parameters of type IndependentDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ConditionalTable.addDistrib(Assignment condition, IndependentDistribution distrib)
      Adds a new continuous probability distribution associated with the given conditional assignment

      Constructor and Description
      ConditionalTable(java.lang.String headVar, java.util.Map<Assignment,IndependentDistribution> distribs)
      Constructs a new probability table, with no values

    • Uses of IndependentDistribution in opendial.inference

      Methods in opendial.inference that return IndependentDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default IndependentDistribution InferenceAlgorithm.queryProb(BNetwork network, java.lang.String queryVar)
      Computes the probability distribution for the query variable, assuming no additional evidence.
      default IndependentDistribution InferenceAlgorithm.queryProb(BNetwork network, java.lang.String queryVar, Assignment evidence)
      Computes the probability distribution for the query variable given the provided evidence.
